column2: We do not share this information with outside parties unless otherwise noted at the time of data entry.
to share general data about those who view our websites with our advertisers
Illini Media partners with Google and OnCampus Advertising to serve some of the ads you see when you visit our websites.
Illini Media also uses Google Analytics that allows us to analyze data on our users' demographics (age, gender)
